CommonEvent.Name: AIE: CSC: Possible DDoS Detected
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: Externally originating denial of service log messages with different Origin Hosts and same impacted host. CIS Critical Security Control(s): CSC 9.6, CSC 12.4

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: SANS: General DoS
CommonEvent.ShortDesc:
AIE: An observed external denial of service log followed by a critical, error, or startup/shutdown on the same impacted host.
Modules: Sans Top 20 APT

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Disruption: Denial of Service
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: An observed denial of service log initiated from an internal source followed by a critical, error, or startup/shutdown on the same impacted host.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Denial Of Service Alert Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule alerts on the occurrence of any identified Denial of Service event in supplemental support of PCI-DSS Controls: 11.4.a-c, 12.10.5

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NERC-CIP : Denial Of Service Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on denial of service activity within the organization infrastructure.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NIST 800-53 : Denial Of Service Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on denial of service activity.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NIST 800-53: Ext Denial Of Service Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details of observed denial of service activity followed by a critical, error, or startup/shutdown on the same impacted host.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NIST 800-53: Ext Distribute Denial Of Service
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details of denial of service log messages with different Origin Hosts on the same impacted host.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: GPG-13 : Denial Of Service Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This report directly supports GPG-13 controls PMC5.2, PMC5.4, and PMC5.8 by providing details of all denial of service activity.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Disruption: Distributed DoS Attack
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: Excessive number of hosts communicating with a single host.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: DoS: TCP DDoS
CommonEvent.ShortDesc:
AIE: Excessive number of hosts making TCP requests against a single destination.
Network Analytics - NTA

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Disruption: DoS (Traffic Threshold)
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: Large number of packets sent from a single external host.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: DoS: IPSec DDoS
CommonEvent.ShortDesc:
AIE: Excessive number of hosts using IPSec or unknown protocols to a single host.
Network Analytics - NTA

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: DoS: ICMP DDoS
CommonEvent.ShortDesc:
AIE: Excessive number of hosts making ICMP requests against a single destination.
Network Analytics - NTA

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Disruption: DMZ DDoS
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: 25x increase in the number of unique hosts connecting to the internal/DMZ webservers.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: CSC: ICMP Flood Detected
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: Single external host sending a single flow with over 60,000 ICMP packets to an internal host. CIS Critical Security Control(s): CSC 12.3

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: CSC: TCP Flood Detected
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: Single external host sending a single flow with over 100,000 TCP packets to an internal host. CIS Critical Security Control(s): CSC 12.3

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: CSC: UDP Flood Detected
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: Single external host sending a single flow with over 100,000 UDP packets to an internal host. CIS Critical Security Control(s): CSC 12.3

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: CSC: Excessive Unknown Application
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: Single external host sending a single flow with over 60,000 packets to an internal host using an Unknown protocol. CIS Critical Security Control(s): CSC 12.3

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: CSF: Denial Of Service Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on denial of service activity.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: CSF: Ext Denial Of Service Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details of observed denial of service activity followed by a critical, error, or startup/shutdown on the same impacted host.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: CSF: Ext Distribute Denial Of Service
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details of denial of service log messages with different Origin Hosts on the same impacted host.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: DoS: DDoS
CommonEvent.ShortDesc:
AIE: Externally originating denial of service log messages with different Origin Hosts and same impacted host.
Network Analytics - NTA

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: DoS: General DoS
CommonEvent.ShortDesc:
AIE: An observed external denial of service log followed by a critical, error, or startup/shutdown on the same impacted host.
Modules: Sans Top 20 APT

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Denial Of Service Alert
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule alerts on the occurrence of any identified Denial of Service event.
